org.dsngroup.broke.protocol

Class MqttEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter
        • io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<MqttMessage>
          • org.dsngroup.broke.protocol.MqttEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelOutboundHandler

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public final class MqttEncoder
extends io.netty.handler.codec.MessageToMessageEncoder<MqttMessage>
    Encodes Mqtt messages into bytes following the protocol specification v3.1 as described here MQTTV3.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler
